pages.text: $(li)The Warped Mosco is the result of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquito$(/l), having sucked the blood of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/mungus)Mungus$(/l) that had previously been infected by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/warped_fungus)Warped Fungus$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will attack everything in its path, a distance shooting hemolymph blast or physically with its great strength.

pages.name: Warped Mosco
pages.text: It may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/hemolymph_sac)Hemolymph Sac$(/l) and a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/warped_muscle)Warped Muscle$(/l) upon death.
